answers.answer: Is the pain right under your boobs? Some contractions start at the top of your uterus.The other upper abdominal pain it could be is high blood pressure(preeclampsia).  Could you check your blood pressure at home? Or like cvs?I think the easiest thing to do is wait it out and see if the possible contractions get stronger or closer together. But don't risk your babies health! If you need to go, go! Your husband would want you to put the baby's safety and yours first.

Yes the pain is under my boobs. Its just staying there not moving down or anything. After the pain eases my daughter kicks me extremely hard. I can't check my bp I can go to CVS. Is there any other way I can tell if I have high bp?
Sounds like contractions.  Some start up there and make their way down. Go into L&D ASAP!  Better safe than sorry !
Should I call before I go to make sure or just go?
I called before I went they told me they couldn't help me over the phone. So just go in.

My doctor said a contraction feels like the top of your stomach tightening alomst.. or pushing downward and then pain/ pressure on you vagina... so if thats what it feels like, utsbprobably contractions.

question: I'm in an extreme amount of pain I'm almost in tears. I can't tell if this is contractions or what. Please help me the pain is in my upper stomach. I will be 30 weeks tomorrow. My doctors are closed an I won't be able to go to the er until my fiance gets here an I don't want him to leave work if its not contractions. Please help
title: please help
